translation.en: ♪ Hey ♪
-♪ This place is hot… ♪ -[man 1] That's not good.
♪ So glad we made it ♪
-♪ You gotta gimme some lovin'… ♪ -[gasps]
[woman on comms] What are you doing, Captain?
I think it's pretty obvious. I'm stealing this jet.
translation.zh: ‎很明显嘛 我要偷走这架飞船

translation.en: [woman] I think it's pretty obvious you're trying to.
-You know I can track your jump. -Yeah, but you know that I know that.
translation.zh: ‎你知道我能追踪到你的穿越 ‎你知道我也知道这件事

translation.en: So one of us doesn't know something else, right?
translation.zh: ‎咱俩之中肯定有人心里有鬼 对吧？

translation.en: [man 2] Ma'am, he's initiated wormhole sequencing.
translation.zh: ‎女士 他启动了虫洞序列

translation.en: [woman] Adam, I want you to listen very carefully.
translation.zh: ‎亚当 我希望你仔细听好

translation.en: If you don't abort right now, I will shoot you out of the--
translation.zh: ‎如果你不现在中止 我就把你崩掉…

translation.en: I'm sorry to interrupt what I'm sure is gonna be a scary threat,
translation.zh: ‎很抱歉打断你如此明显的威胁

translation.en: but if I'm right, your tracking system is about to…
translation.zh:
‎但如果我的估计是对的
‎你的追踪系统即将…

translation.en: -…crash. -♪ We made it, baby ♪
-♪ Gimme some lovin' ♪ -♪ Gimme some lovin' ♪
-Okay, let's not die! -[alarm beeping]
[boy] Adam!
I'm gonna kill you!
Reed!
Oh no. I'm so sorry.
That's my bad. Hi.
-No. -Okay. Bye!
[boy] Reed! Get your ass back here.
-Got anything else you wanna say? -Actually, I--
translation.zh:
‎-还有什么要说的吗？
‎-其实 我…

translation.en: -[groans] -Huh? No more jokes?
-Oh, I'm gonna enjoy this. -[Adam] Who talks like that?
translation.zh:
‎-我一定会很爽
‎-谁会这样说话？

translation.en: Did you order, like, a "Bully Starter Kit" on Amazon or somethin'?
translation.zh:
‎你是在亚马逊上订购了
‎“霸凌新手包”吗？

translation.en: I mean, do you even hear yourself? Chuck, we talked about this.
translation.zh: ‎听听你在说什么 查克 我们聊过的

translation.en: -I didn't say anything. -Shut up, Chuck.
translation.zh:
‎-我什么都没说
‎-闭嘴 查克

translation.en: [man on PA] There will be an assembly in the gymnasium now. Please proceed to the gymnasium.
translation.zh: ‎体育馆会召开集会 请到…

translation.en: Not a word.
[Mrs. Reed] See his face?
And, what, you're gonna suspend Adam? Because what?
translation.zh:
‎怎么着 你要让亚当停课吗？
‎因为什么？

translation.en: You think he started a fight with that thug Ray?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得是他先挑衅那个小混混雷？

translation.en: Was it Ray Dollarhyde again?
It's barely been a year since we lost his father.
You could show some compassion.
[Adam] It wasn't my fault.
I know you, Adam. I know that mouth of yours. I know exactly what got you punched.
translation.zh:
‎我了解你 我知道你那张嘴
‎我知道你到底为什么挨揍

translation.en: He was giving me crap in front of the whole class.
translation.zh:
‎他当着全班同学让我难堪
‎我不能就这么算了啊

translation.en: -I couldn't just take it. -He's twice your size.
translation.zh:
‎他当着全班同学让我难堪
‎我不能就这么算了啊 ‎他的块头是你的两倍

translation.en: Everyone is twice my size. I've seen babies bigger than me.
translation.zh:
‎所有人的块头都是我的两倍
‎我甚至见过比我大的婴儿

translation.en: -I don't understand you. -Dad would.
What's going on, honey? Can you just tell me?
translation.zh: ‎怎么回事 亲爱的？你能告诉我吗？

translation.en: If I keep having to leave work in the middle of the day,
I'm gonna lose my job. It's the third time you've been suspended for fighting.
translation.zh:
‎就会丢掉工作
‎这已经是你第三次因为打架被停课了

translation.en: You'd think I'd be better at it by now.
translation.zh: ‎你肯定觉得我现在应该更能打才对

translation.en: This goes on your permanent record. Get that? Care about your future?
translation.zh:
‎这种事会被写进档案跟你一辈子
‎你明白吗？你在乎自己的未来吗？

translation.en: Do you? Son, you'd better start caring, because the future is coming,
translation.zh:
‎你在乎吗？儿子 你最好开始上心
‎因为未来要来了

translation.en: sooner than you think.
[Mrs. Reed] Hey, Adam.
Adam, I'm headed out.
Come and have your dinner.
Where you goin'?
Oh, just out to dinner with a friend.
Which friend?
-His name's Derek. We work together. -You're goin' on a date.
translation.zh:
‎-他叫德里克 我们是同事
‎-你是要去约会

translation.en: -Not a date. I don't think it's a date. -Your dress thinks it is.
translation.zh: ‎不是约会 我觉得不是 ‎你的裙子觉得是

translation.en: Oh, it is a date. I am going on a date. Why am I going on a date?
translation.zh:
‎真的是约会 我要去约会
‎我为什么要去约会？

translation.en: Can we please stop saying "date" now? Thanks.
Adam, I'm sorry. We… we should have spoken about this.
translation.zh: ‎亚当 对不起 我们应该早点聊聊的

translation.en: I don't know how to handle it. Let's talk about it now.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道如何面对 我们现在就聊吧

translation.en: -Dear God, no. -No! You can have any kind of feeling.
translation.zh:
‎-老天爷 不要
‎-不行！你不能有任何心结

translation.en: -It's normal. As long as we're a team-- -[phone alert]
translation.zh:
‎只要我们母子同心
‎这根本就不算什么

translation.en: Oh! Time to go.
[Mrs. Reed] He texted me?
Well, look at that.
It's a whole new world.
translation.zh:
‎这是个全新的世界
‎但我们今晚一定会聊聊

translation.en: -But we will talk about it tonight, honey. -Mom, wait.
translation.zh:
‎这是个全新的世界
‎但我们今晚一定会聊聊 ‎妈妈 等一下

translation.en: -What? -Turn around.
-Make good choices, okay? -Said the boy who got suspended.
translation.zh:
‎-一定要谨慎决策 好吗？
‎-被停课的男孩如是说

translation.en: [chuckles] I love you, honey.
I love you too, Mom. More than I know.
translation.zh: ‎我也爱你 妈妈 比我想象中更爱

translation.en: [Mrs. Reed] Listen, while I'm out, lock up the back.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我出去的时候 把后门锁好

translation.en: No ovens, no answering the door, no video games.
translation.zh:
‎不许用烤箱 不许开门
‎不许玩电子游戏

translation.en: Hawking?
What is it? You see something?
-[whining] -Hawking, stop! Hawking!
[echoing] Hawking!
Whoa!
-[Hawking whimpers] -Oh my God. You scared the crap out of me.
-[rustling] -Who's there?
I don't think we should be out here.
We're okay.
-[barking] -Hawking!
Take it easy.
-Or, you know, fall down and scream. -[clattering]
-Jeez. Who the hell are you? -Put the bat down.
translation.zh:
‎-老天 你到底是谁？
‎-把球棒放下

translation.en: Put the bat down. I'm not gonna hurt you, I promise.
translation.zh: ‎把球棒放下 我不会伤害你 我保证

translation.en: -What are you doing in here? -Mostly bleeding.
translation.zh:
‎-你在这里做什么？
‎-主要是在流血

translation.en: [sighs] Wait, how old are you?
-What? -How old are you?
Twelve.
[whispers] Twelve…
Shit!
-How did you get in my dad's garage? -I… It was open.
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么进来我爸车库的？
‎-我…车库没锁

translation.en: No, it wasn't. And that is a flight suit. Are you a pilot?
translation.zh:
‎不 明明是锁着的 你还穿着飞行服
‎你是飞行员吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, listen to me. Uh--
Don't-- Hey, don't call anyone. Put the phone down. I won't hurt you.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 别打给任何人 把电话放下
‎我不会伤害你

translation.en: You said that already.
-Well, it bears-- God damn it! -[squelching]
Uh, it bears repeating. -[sighs] -That's a lot of blood.
Well… well, I have so much more in my body. Where's your mother?
translation.zh: ‎我身体里血多得是 你妈妈呢？

translation.en: On a date.
With who?
-What? -With who? What's his name?
-I don't know. Derek? -Derek?
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道 德里克？
‎-德里克？

translation.en: Derek. Derek, Derek, Derek. That's, yes, the guy with the, um… with the mouth mullet.
translation.zh: ‎德里克 没错 那个鲻鱼胡家伙

translation.en: -The goatee? -Yeah.
So say goatee.
-Yeah, he doesn't matter. -None of them matter.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 他不重要
‎-他们都不重要

translation.en: Nice dog.
I'm gonna go inside the house.
I'm gonna get some stuff.
Hey, careful with that.
-Stay here. -[clattering]
[groans] Come on.
[grunts] Told you to stay in the garage.
And let some creepy dude just wander around my house alone?
translation.zh:
‎让一个奇怪的家伙独自
‎在我家里乱转？

translation.en: -Yeah… -I don't think so.
Yeah, believe me. I don't wanna be here any more than you want me here.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 相信我 你不希望我在这里
‎我也巴不得赶紧走呢

translation.en: I just gotta stop bleeding long enough.
Gotta dress the wound, prevent a nasty infection,
translation.zh: ‎我包扎好伤口 预防感染

translation.en: and I will be on my merry way.
Don't touch that.
-I was just looking. -Don't touch my stuff.
-Is this a lightsaber? -No, it's not.
-Okay. -No. Enough with the bat!
translation.zh: ‎好吧 ‎够了 别再耍球棍了 好吗？

translation.en: -[clattering] -If I wanted to hurt you, I would have.
translation.zh: ‎我要是想伤害你 早就动手了

translation.en: If I'm being honest with myself, you have a very punchable face.
translation.zh:
‎如果我遵从内心的想法
‎你的脸早就被我打烂了

translation.en: -Oh my-- -God! That--
Gah! That bullet went straight through. Good. -Cool. -Wait, wait, wait. Bullet? You were shot?
translation.zh:
‎-子弹直直穿过去了 很好
‎-等一下 子弹？你中枪了？

translation.en: Yeah-- No, actually, no.
No, I was stabbed with a bullet. What do you think, you moron?
translation.zh:
‎不是 我是被子弹扎了一下
‎你以为呢 白痴？

translation.en: -I'm a moron? You're the one who was shot. -All right, okay, that's it. [coughs]
translation.zh:
‎-白痴？明明是你中枪了
‎-好吧 够了

translation.en: -[farting sound] -That… Wow… That, uh…
That's weird. It farts when I cough.
translation.zh: ‎好奇怪 我一咳嗽它就放屁

translation.en: -Gross. -Super gross.
I'm gonna go upstairs, grab some stuff. Stay cool. You can trust me.
translation.zh:
‎我去楼上找点东西 你冷静
‎你可以相信我

translation.en: Easy for you to say. I'm the one who ends up in a therapist's office,
translation.zh:
‎你说得轻巧
‎最后还不是我去看心理医生

translation.en: telling them about where the bad man touched me.
translation.zh: ‎告诉他们一个坏人猥亵了我

translation.en: Oh God! That's where you go? Immediately? You are dark, man.
translation.zh:
‎老天！你非要往那地方想吗？
‎不假思索就想到了？你心理好阴暗

translation.en: -[young Adam] Who even are you? -That is classified.
Why are you here?
-Also classi… classified. -Are you in the air force?
When I say "classified," what does your brain hear? Chocolate?
translation.zh:
‎我说“机密”的时候
‎你的大脑听到了什么？巧克力吗？

translation.en: -What's with the lightsaber? -It's not a lightsaber.
translation.zh:
‎-那把光剑是怎么回事？
‎-那不是光剑

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Adam. -I need you to play it cool. -Wait.
translation.zh: ‎老天爷 亚当 你淡定一点

translation.en: -I know playing it cool isn't your thing. -Wait.
translation.zh: ‎我知道淡定不是你的强项 从来都不…

translation.en: -It never has been-- -Wait, wait! How do you know my name?
translation.zh: ‎我知道淡定不是你的强项 从来都不… ‎等一下！你怎么知道我叫什么？

translation.en: You're Adam Reed. Born February 10th, 2010.
translation.zh: ‎你是亚当里德 出生于2010年2月10日

translation.en: Your parents are Ellie and Louis Reed. Louis would've died about a year ago.
translation.zh:
‎你父母是艾莉里德和路易斯里德
‎路易斯大概一年前过世了

translation.en: You don't play any sports because of acute asthma.
translation.zh: ‎你因为哮喘 从不参与任何运动

translation.en: -Plus you're freakishly small for 12. -[frantic barking]
translation.zh:
‎而且对12岁的孩子来说
‎你个子反常地小

translation.en: You go to Franklin Middle School,
where you've been suspended two, three times for fighting,
translation.zh: ‎已经因为打架被停课两次或三次

translation.en: which is ironic because you can't fight to save your life.
translation.zh:
‎这很讽刺 因为你手无缚鸡之力
‎根本救不了自己的命

translation.en: [in unison] Hawking! Zip it!
How do you know my dog's name?
Because I named him.
-Where are you goin'? -[gasps]
-[wheezing] -Oh God.
[shakes inhaler] All right.
Here, ready? Deep breath.
Hold it.
Three, two, one.
Everybody gets a trophy.
When I was seven,
I ran into a table on the patio.
I got 12 stitches.
[in unison] Right here.
You knew how to get into my dad's garage.
You knew how to close the fridge.
You knew how to time my breathing.
We have the same scar.
And you're wearing my dad's watch.
This watch.
This watch.
You're me.
Holy shi--
That's classified. But yes…
I once was.
I can't believe you're future me.
Okay, you came to terms with that pretty quickly. It's a little disturbing, actually.
translation.zh:
‎你刚才接受得倒是挺快
‎虽然有点让人困扰

translation.en: -So why are you here? -Rescue mission.
translation.zh:
‎-你回来干什么？
‎-执行救援任务

translation.en: I wasn't supposed to land here. I was aiming for 2018.
translation.zh:
‎我不该在这里着陆的
‎我本来要去2018年

translation.en: -I need to get there as soon as possible. -Who were you trying to save in 2018?
translation.zh:
‎-我需要尽快赶去那里
‎-你想去2018年救谁？

translation.en: Really?
Fine. Can you at least tell me how you got here?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 那你至少能告诉我
‎你是怎么回来的吧？

translation.en: I'll show ya.
What was that?
-Crap. -What?
Uh, we're gonna switch to plan A, which is where you come in.
translation.zh:
‎我们要换到A计划
‎这时候就该你发挥作用了

translation.en: You see, time jets, like all tech in the future,
translation.zh:
‎是这样的 时光飞船就像未来
‎所有的技术一样

translation.en: is coded to its user's DNA.
Because I'm injured… aah, the jet won't even clear me to fly,
translation.zh: ‎因为我受伤了 所以它不允许我飞行

translation.en: which means I can't get in there to fix her.
translation.zh: ‎也就是说 我没办法进去修理

translation.en: But guess who can?
There she is.
[Adam] Away we go.
Okay. Sit down.
-Oh my God. -Yeah, yeah, yeah. Sit down.
Let's see what we're dealing with here. All right, some minor shield damage.
translation.zh: ‎我看看是什么情况 ‎防护罩轻微破裂

translation.en: -Coolant leaks. -[beeping]
I don't know what that is, but when is a flashing red light ever good?
translation.zh:
‎我不知道这是什么情况
‎但红色警报闪起向来不是什么好事

translation.en: I know you wanna touch all the pretty buttons
translation.zh: ‎我知道你想用自己黏乎乎的

translation.en: with your sticky little child fingers, but the reactor has a quantum signature.
translation.zh:
‎臭小子手指把这些漂亮的按钮摸个遍
‎但反应器有量子签名

translation.en: You fire it up, they can find us.
translation.zh:
‎你要是不小心启动了
‎他们就会找到我们

translation.en: If they're here.
Who are "they"?
I'm glad that you didn't ask me that because "they" are classified.
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴你没问 因为“他们”是机密

translation.en: -I already know you're from the future. -Believe me, I regret that.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你来自未来 ‎相信我 也很后悔

translation.en: I had no intention of coming back to revisit… this.
translation.zh: ‎我根本不想回来重温这种旧梦

translation.en: Jesus. Okay.
Okay, I've isolated the damaged relays,
translation.zh: ‎好的 我已经隔离了受损的继电器

translation.en: so the ship should be able to start repairing itself.
translation.zh: ‎所以飞船应该能开始自我修复了

translation.en: How long will that take?
Ah, it's at 50% capacity,
so hopefully less time than it takes me to heal.
translation.zh: ‎所以但愿能在我伤口愈合之前修复好

translation.en: [young Adam] Wait.
-Do you remember this? -Remember what?
This. Right here, right now.
You being here in 2022?
translation.zh:
‎-你回到2022年？
‎-我知道你心里怎么想的

translation.en: -Know where you're going with this. -If this is happening to me--
translation.zh:
‎-你回到2022年？
‎-我知道你心里怎么想的 ‎-如果我摊上这种事…
‎-你这是浪费时间

translation.en: -You're wasting your time. -That means it already happened to you.
translation.zh:
‎-如果我摊上这种事…
‎-你这是浪费时间 ‎…反正你已经摊上了

translation.en: Unless it works like a multiverse, where each ripple creates an alternate timeline--
translation.zh:
‎除非是像多元宇宙那样
‎每道微波都会产生一个时间线

translation.en: It's not a multiverse!
My God, we watched too many movies.
translation.zh: ‎老天 我们真是看了太多电影

translation.en: I just wanna know.
Okay.
Okay, the prevailing wisdom is that when I go back to my fixed time,
translation.zh:
‎好吧 主流观点是
‎我回到自己的固定时间时

translation.en: my memory… our memories, they reform, they reconcile.
translation.zh:
‎我的记忆…我们的记忆
‎它们就会发生改良 就会发生调和

translation.en: -But not while I'm here. -Fixed time? What's that?
translation.zh:
‎-但我在这里的时候不会
‎-固定时间？那是什么？

translation.en: There's only one place in time where you belong on a quantum level,
translation.zh: ‎在量子层面 你只属于某一个时空

translation.en: where you're not screwing around with the cosmos like I am.
translation.zh:
‎你在那里不会像我现在这样
‎在宇宙瞎晃悠

translation.en: That is your fixed time.
Where you actually belong.
So by being here and telling me this,
translation.zh: ‎所以你来到这里 跟我解释这些

translation.en: you may have just changed my whole future?
Honestly? Your future is pretty tragic either way.
translation.zh: ‎说实话？反正你的未来也是悲剧

translation.en: [laughs] I'm kidding! I'm kidding.
I'm not kidding.
I'm kidding. Let's go. Come on. Here we go.
translation.zh: ‎我开玩笑的 走吧 快点 走了

translation.en: [young Adam] So what happens now?
Nothin'. I'm just gonna lay down. Let this bullet wound heal.
translation.zh:
‎什么都不做 我要躺下休息
‎让子弹伤口愈合

translation.en: Think about some key investment opportunities for your future.
translation.zh: ‎为你的未来思考一些关键投资机会

translation.en: -Wait, like Biff from Back to the-- -Are you out of your tiny mind?
translation.zh:
‎-等一下 就像《回到未来》的比…
‎-你那核桃脑仁坏掉了吧？

translation.en: Get back in the house before our mother gets home, and don't make it weird.
translation.zh:
‎趁妈妈还没回来 赶紧回房子里去
‎而且别引起她的怀疑

translation.en: -[sniffles] -Hey. [frustratedly] Yes?
-This is amazing. -Isn't it, though?
Mind hitting the light on your way out?
translation.zh: ‎你出去的时候能把灯关上吗？

translation.en: Oh, hey. I'm surprised you're still up.
Well, this night's been full of surprises, mother. That's chilling. What happened?
translation.zh:
‎-今晚真是惊喜连连
‎-不错 发生什么事了？

translation.en: How was your not-a-date? Will you be seeing him again?
translation.zh:
‎你那不是约会的晚饭如何？
‎你还会跟他见面吗？

translation.en: -No. I don't know. I don't think so. -[knocking at door]
-Hi. -Hi.
-Me again. -Yes, it is.
You left your scarf in my car.
-I did. Gosh, thanks. -[Derek] Oh, hey there, kiddo.
translation.zh: ‎没错 老天 谢谢 ‎你好 孩子

translation.en: Oh. This is my son, Adam. Adam, this is Derek.
translation.zh: ‎这是我儿子亚当 亚当 这是德里克

translation.en: Oh, hey, Adam.
Hello. You have a wonderful mouth mullet. You must be very proud.
translation.zh:
‎你好 你的鲻鱼胡真好看
‎你一定很自豪吧

translation.en: Oh my gosh, Adam. [laughs]
-Never heard it called that before. -Well, thanks again.
translation.zh: ‎我还没听过这种叫法 ‎再次谢谢你了

translation.en: Sure. See you soon.
Unlikely, but I'll put in a good word for you.
translation.zh:
‎应该再也见不着了
‎但我会为你美言几句

translation.en: Okay. Okay. I'll see you at work.
-[Derek] Yeah. -Bye.
He seems nice.
What?
You can be a real jerk sometimes.
You know that? [sighs]
Hey there. Good morning.
Shouldn't you be at work?
Yeah, I need to pay the insurance on the house today.
translation.zh: ‎对 我今天需要把房子的保险费付了

translation.en: Had it in the calendar, but I can't find the statement.
translation.zh: ‎日历上有标注 但我找不到结算单

translation.en: [Adam] With that filing system?
Shocking. It should all be online.
translation.zh: ‎真逗 应该都在网上操作的

translation.en: The minute I find myself with a few extra hours, I will set up those accounts.
translation.zh:
‎等我有了几个小时的空闲时间
‎一定会立马设置账号

translation.en: Until then, this is how your dad did it.
translation.zh:
‎在那之前就这样吧
‎你爸之前就用的这法子

translation.en: Hey, grab a pile.
Sorry. I gotta get to my room to think about what I've done.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我得回房间反思自己的行为

translation.en: Okay.
I gotta go.
Call me if you need me.
[Adam] I won't.
Mom's gone to work.
-Dad's favorite song. -♪ There's only one thing ♪
-♪ Gonna set you free… ♪ -Yeah, me too.
-♪ That's my love… ♪ -See, we agreed on something. -Maybe the only thing. -♪ That's my love… ♪
translation.zh:
‎瞧见没 我们还是有共识的
‎或许这是唯一的共识

translation.en: -♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ -What?
-I just… You're… kinda ripped. -♪ Let my love open the door ♪
-♪ When everything feels… ♪ -Okay.
Do you work out?
-My genetics don't… -Ever have a thought and not let it out?
translation.zh:
‎你就没有过
‎把想法憋在心里的时候吗？

translation.en: Could be fun to just keep it in.
translation.zh: ‎憋在心里或许更好玩呢 对

translation.en: Maybe in the future, there's, like… like, gene therapy or nanotechnology for--
translation.zh: ‎或许未来会有基因治疗或纳米技术…

translation.en: -Don't do it. Don't… don't do it. -♪ Let my love open the door ♪
-♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ -So when does… all this happen.
Does everyone skip leg day in the future?
-♪ To your heart… ♪ -Does it happen in college?
Oh, wait. Do we get a lot of girls in college?
translation.zh:
‎等一下 我们在大学
‎是不是很有女生缘？

translation.en: -I-- -Adam, time travel exists.
translation.zh: ‎亚当 时间旅行真的存在

translation.en: [laughs] It exists. Isn't that crazy?
translation.zh: ‎真的存在 是不是很离谱？

translation.en: Every conceptual idea you have about the universe
has just been thrown out the window. Yet your big question is, "Do I get laid?"
translation.zh:
‎都被抛之脑后 但你最关心的问题是
‎“我有没有滚床单？”

translation.en: -Do I? -[Adam] Jesus Christ.
-I was just wondering. -[Adam] Wonder in silence.
translation.zh:
‎-我就是想知道
‎-那你在静默中想就是了

translation.en: -♪ Let my love open the door ♪ -Oh my God! It's gonna happen!
-Where you goin'? -Drugstore.
I need to get this wound closed up.
You're gonna go dressed like that?
Why don't you wear some of Dad's clothes?
How long ago was Dad's accident?
About a year and a half ago.
She still hasn't cleaned out his closet.
translation.zh: ‎她还是没有把他的衣服收起来

translation.en: She's not much of a housekeeper.
Hey. You have her to take care of you. She has no one. You understand?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 你还有她照顾你
‎她却没有任何人可依靠 你懂吗？

translation.en: Do you understand?
She wakes up every morning
with a broken heart and a closet full of his clothes
translation.zh: ‎她每天早上伤心地醒来 ‎柜子里全是他的衣服

translation.en: and gets nothing from you but a fistful of crap, and not even, like, ten seconds of genuine empathy.
translation.zh:
‎而你却净对她说些刻薄的话
‎一丁点同理心都没有

translation.en: I'm you, you know.
Tell me about it.
You know, 30 years, you still get sick to your stomach
translation.zh:
‎其实这30年来
‎你每每想到之前那样对待她

translation.en: every time you remember how you treated her now.
I used to love this jacket.
Dad did too.
I keep waiting to wake up and miss him less,
translation.zh:
‎我一直盼着哪一天醒来
‎对他的思念会有所减少

translation.en: but that hasn't happened yet.
Do you still miss him?
Missed him while he was here.
-It's not gonna fit you. -Sure it will.
-[bleeping] -[young Adam] How's the jet?
It's gettin' there.
So the person you came to save is in 2018.
translation.zh: ‎所以你回来拯救的那个人在2018年

translation.en: And somehow, you ended up in 2022. How does that work? You just missed?
translation.zh:
‎但你不知怎的回到了2022年
‎怎么会这样？你搞错了吗？

translation.en: Well, I got shot when I was stealing the plane.
So, uh… I was losin' blood. Ship was comin' apart.
translation.zh: ‎所以我失了很多血 飞船差点散架

translation.en: I jammed the coordinates. I didn't have time to double-check 'em.
translation.zh:
‎我在慌乱中输入了坐标
‎都没时间检查一遍

translation.en: -Wait, you stole the jet? -It's encoded to me.
translation.zh:
‎-等等 飞船是你偷来的？
‎-它加密在我身上

translation.en: So I didn't exactly steal it. I borrowed the shit out of it.
translation.zh: ‎所以我那不叫偷 只是借用而已

translation.en: -There's a difference. Give me some cash. -You don't have money?
translation.zh:
‎这是有区别的 给我点现金 ‎-你没钱吗？
‎-我们在未来不用钱

translation.en: -We don't use money in the future. -Really?
translation.zh:
‎-你没钱吗？
‎-我们在未来不用钱 ‎真的吗？

translation.en: Of course we use money in the future. Stay here.
translation.zh: ‎我们在未来当然用钱 你在这里等着

translation.en: [Chuck laughs] What's up, Reed?
Crap.
Well, look who we have here.
Ray, can we just take a break from the ass kicking today?
translation.zh: ‎雷 我们今天能不玩揍人吗？

translation.en: I have a lot going on.
Hey, guys. Enjoying our suspension?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 两位 你们停课还快乐吧？

translation.en: I am now.
[young Adam groans] That's my spleen.
I remember these little turd-burpers.
-Hey, man, we're, uh… just playin' around. -Quiet, Ray. This isn't about you.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我们就是闹着玩 ‎别说话 雷 这跟你没关系

translation.en: Chuck.
Hey, what's goin' on? Huh?
Get it together. Ray's ready. You're embarrassing yourself.
translation.zh:
‎振作起来 雷一副志在必得的样子
‎你就是给自己找难堪

translation.en: So you're not gonna break this up?
God, no. That'd be irresponsible of me.
translation.zh: ‎当然不会 那样太不负责任了

translation.en: You'll just figure out some other way to pound the crap out of him.
translation.zh:
‎反正你总会找别的法子
‎把他揍得眼冒金星

translation.en: You always do.
He's got a big mouth. I get it.
Point is, this fight needs to happen right now.
translation.zh: ‎问题是 你们现在得打这一架

translation.en: So just give us a second, okay, Ray?
translation.zh: ‎等我们一下 好吗 雷？

translation.en: Stretch out. You don't wanna pull a hammy.
translation.zh: ‎拉伸一下 伤了腘绳肌腱可不好

translation.en: What are you doing?
Hey, Ray Dollarhyde has been bullying you for years
translation.zh:
‎嘿 雷多勒海德因为你个头小
‎弱不禁风 嘴巴还恶毒

translation.en: because you're small, and fragile, and you have a big mouth.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 雷多勒海德因为你个头小
‎弱不禁风 嘴巴还恶毒 ‎多年来一直欺负你
‎但问题是 他不想打架

translation.en: But here's the thing. He doesn't wanna fight.
translation.zh:
‎多年来一直欺负你
‎但问题是 他不想打架

translation.en: -I don't wanna fight either. -He doesn't know that, does he?
So you're gonna walk over there, and you're gonna raise your hands,
translation.zh: ‎所以你要走过去 举起双手

translation.en: and then you're gonna look Ray right in the eye.
You're gonna smile in a way that says,
"I've waited my entire life for this moment."
Like you can't wait to watch his soul exit his body.
Then you're gonna drop to your knees
and punch him hard in the private bathing suit parts.
translation.zh: ‎拼尽全力打他的私密泳衣部位

translation.en: -I'm sorry, the what now? -Ah! Are we gonna smoke this banana?
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 打哪里？ ‎我们是要撸起袖子干
‎还是说上一整天？快去！

translation.en: Or are we gonna talk about it all day? Let's go, go, go, go, go.
translation.zh:
‎我们是要撸起袖子干
‎还是说上一整天？快去！

translation.en: I'm gonna smoke your banana, motherf--
translation.zh: ‎我要撸起袖子干扁你 王八…

translation.en: No, no, no, no! No. That… that's not what we talked about.
-[groans] -[Ray] Boom! [laughing] Oh yeah!
-[Chuck] Nice, man. -[Ray] You crying, Reed?
translation.zh:
‎-不错 伙计
‎-你在哭吗 里德？

translation.en: Oh no, Chuck. Look, we made him cry.
translation.zh: ‎不 查克 看啊 我们把他揍哭了

translation.en: [Chuck] It's like he was trying to lose.
Run away, Reed!
-What the hell? -I'm not supposed to do this.
Ever hear the expression, "Every bully has a bully"?
translation.zh:
‎但你听说过
‎“卤水点豆腐 一物降一物”吗？

translation.en: Yours isn't holding up his end of the bargain, so I'm gonna take over.
translation.zh: ‎你要点的那块豆腐临阵脱逃了 ‎所以我来接手

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -[shushes]
You're a good fighter. You like to kick ass. You're a big kid.
translation.zh:
‎你很会打架 喜欢揍别人
‎你是个大孩子

translation.en: But if you go near Adam again, I'll know, and I will find you, Ray.
translation.zh:
‎但你要是再敢靠近亚当
‎我一定会知道 我会找你算账 雷

translation.en: And it won't be like a couple of kids in a playground scrap.
translation.zh: ‎到时候就不像是几个孩子闹着玩了

translation.en: I will pull bones out of your body.
I will sharpen them.
-I will use them to stab little Chuckie. -What did I do?
translation.zh:
‎-然后用它们去捅小查克
‎-我做错什么了？

translation.en: Shut your mouth, or I'll fill it with Ray's feet.
translation.zh: ‎闭嘴 不然我就把雷的臭脚塞你嘴里

translation.en: You understand what I'm saying? Got all of it? The bones? -Yeah. -Your feet in Chuckie's mouth?
translation.zh:
‎明白我的意思吗？
‎骨头 还有把你的脚塞进查克嘴里？

translation.en: -[liquid running] -Good. Are you peeing right now? -Yeah. -You're a real streamer.
translation.zh:
‎很好 你尿裤子了吗？
‎你真是个小水库呢

translation.en: Get yourself home and clean yourself up.
Be the change you wanna see, okay?
God, I hated those assholes.
translation.zh: ‎老天 我真讨厌那俩混蛋

translation.en: Oh, come on.
Hey, Adam.
Get out of my stuff and open the door.
translation.zh: ‎别碰我的东西 把门打开

translation.en: Put the drone down. It will kill us both.
translation.zh: ‎把无人机放下 那玩意会害死咱俩

translation.en: Hey, look, you lost one fight. I figured you'd be used to that by now.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 听着 不就是打架输了一次嘛
‎我以为你早就习惯了

translation.en: You coulda helped. You just stood there.
translation.zh: ‎你该帮我的 但你就在那里干站着

translation.en: Christ. You're so sensitive.
Hey, you had to lose that fight.
You had to. Trust me.
You don't go from bein' you to bein' me without gettin' your ass kicked,
a lot, all the time.
I'm sorry if I went too far today.
translation.zh: ‎如果我今天太过分 抱歉了

translation.en: Shouldn't have done that.
-[young Adam] Who's this? -Who's who?
Put that back.
You put that back.
As soon as you tell me who she is.
That's my wife, Laura.
We have a wife?
No, we do not have a wife anymore.
-[Ellie] Hey. -Hi.
-[man] Aah. Hi, there. How are you? -Hey, Paul.
translation.zh:
‎-你好 最近怎么样？
‎-嘿 保罗

translation.en: [Paul] Been a while.
[Ellie] Yep, how you doin'? That baby sleeping yet?
translation.zh: ‎对 你怎么样？宝宝睡着了吗？

translation.en: Uh, not really. No.
[chuckles] No. Well, you'll miss those days when they're gone.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 等他们离开后
‎你一定会怀念这段时光

translation.en: Ah, I find that hard to believe.
[Ellie] Believe it. Babies are pure love.
translation.zh: ‎你就信了吧 宝宝满心都是纯纯的爱

translation.en: They grow into teenagers, who grow into be assassins of happiness.
translation.zh:
‎等他们长到十几岁
‎就会变成快乐杀手

translation.en: Thank you, thank you.
Mm, well, somethin' to look forward to. [chuckles]
Sorry. It's been a rough day.
Year. Couple of years.
Hmm. Your boy still havin' a hard time?
He hates me.
It's not his fault. He's… he's just dealing.
translation.zh: ‎这不怪他 他只是在接受

translation.en: It's fine. We'll be fine. It's good. Good, good, good.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我们会好起来的 没事

translation.en: I wish I knew what I was doin' wrong.
translation.zh: ‎我真希望知道自己做错什么了

translation.en: You're not doin' anything wrong.
Sorry. [laughs]
-I'm sorry. -[laughing] Sorry, you scared me.
-I was eavesdropping. I'm sorry. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我刚才在偷听 不好意思
‎-没事

translation.en: [chuckles] You're right, though. Teenage boys are horrible.
translation.zh: ‎你说得对 十几岁的男孩就是噩梦

translation.en: It's like living with a urinal cake that yells at you.
translation.zh:
‎感觉就像跟喜欢冲你吼的
‎屎尿蛋糕一起生活

translation.en: Mothers are usually the ones who take the hit.
Yeah.
-But I'll tell you somethin'. -Mmm?
Boys always come back for their mamas.
That's nice.
It sounds like you're speaking from experience.
I am.
You have a good mom?
-[Adam] I do. -Oh.
[whispers] I have the best mom.
Good.
I hope you're right.
I'm still researching boarding schools in Fallujah, so…
translation.zh: ‎我还在考察法鲁贾的寄宿学校 所以…

translation.en: -Good. -[both laugh]
No, I don't mean that. He's such a sweet kid.
translation.zh:
‎不 我开玩笑的
‎他是个非常贴心的孩子

translation.en: I'm crazy about him.
We lost his dad in a car accident year before last.
Yeah. That's tough.
Yeah. You have no idea.
Well, I have some idea.
-Oh, sorry. -Sorry.
Jinx.
-Thank you. -[Adam] Thank you.
Aren't you grieving too?
-Yeah. -[Adam] Yeah.
I am. Of course I am.
So tell him.
You should tell him.
I don't think he needs it.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他不必知道我的痛苦

translation.en: You think you're being strong for him,
translation.zh: ‎你以为自己在为他故作坚强

translation.en: and the problem with acting like you have it all together is…
translation.zh: ‎但问题是 你假装镇定的话

translation.en: he believes it.
Maybe he needs to know that you don't.
translation.zh: ‎或许他需要知道你也很难过

translation.en: It's okay if you don't.
My husband had a jacket just like that.
translation.zh: ‎我丈夫也有一件那样的外套

translation.en: Oh, this is a classic.
Yeah.
It was really nice chatting with you. I'll see you later.
Oh, hey, um…
he doesn't hate you.
He loves you.
More than he knows.
Hey! Hey!
Locked and docked.
Start the area scans for his jet. Let's find him and get the hell outta here.
translation.zh:
‎开启区域扫描 寻找他的飞船
‎我们赶紧找到他 然后离开这里

translation.en: Find him.
-So you came back for your wife, Laura? -We're not getting into that.
translation.zh:
‎-所以你回来找妻子劳拉？
‎-我不跟你聊这个

translation.en: Hey, she's my wife too.
-You know what? We should get into that. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-其实 我们应该好好聊聊
‎-谢谢

translation.en: Met in the academy.
She was 20 minutes late to the wrong classroom
translation.zh: ‎她迟到了20分钟 走错了教室

translation.en: in the wrong building.
I offered to walk her to the right one, and…
man, I was all in before we even made it outside.
translation.zh:
‎老天 我们还没走出门
‎我就彻底沉沦了

translation.en: A couple of years ago, she didn't come back from a jump.
translation.zh: ‎几年前 在一次穿越中 她没能回来

translation.en: They told me her jet broke up on reentry, but she was the best pilot in the program.
translation.zh:
‎他们说她的飞船在折返时坏了
‎但她是项目里最优秀的飞行员

translation.en: She wrote the book on reentry. Didn't make sense.
translation.zh:
‎她还写了一本关于折返的书
‎这说不通

translation.en: And you were trying to get to 2018 'cause that's where she went before?
translation.zh: ‎你想回2018年是因为她去了那里吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
-What was she doing there? -I don't know.
They changed the jump logs.
Somebody was hidin' somethin'.
Maybe she saw something Sorian didn't want her to see.
translation.zh:
‎或许她看到了索里兰
‎不希望她看到的东西

translation.en: Wait, "Sorian"? Maya Sorian, Dad's partner?
translation.zh:
‎等一下 “索里兰”？
‎玛雅索里兰 爸爸的合伙人？

translation.en: -She was always so nice to me. -Hmm.
Yeah, trust me. She's no friend.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 相信我 她不是你的朋友

translation.en: Nope.
After Dad died, she got rich off of his tech.
translation.zh: ‎爸爸去世后 她靠他的技术发家致富

translation.en: Bought all the right people.
Next thing you know,
she has exclusive control over the most valuable resource on Earth,
translation.zh: ‎很快 她就独家控制了 ‎地球上最宝贵的资源

translation.en: time.
Wait a minute. You're saying Dad invented time travel?
translation.zh:
‎等一下
‎你是说爸爸发明了时间旅行？

translation.en: Yeah. Not on purpose.
The magnetic particle accelerator. Remember that?
translation.zh: ‎磁粒子加速器 还记得吗？

translation.en: He called it The Adam Project.
[Adam] Yeah, or as I like to call it, his favorite child.
translation.zh:
‎对 我一般喜欢称之为
‎“他最爱的孩子”

translation.en: So what happened to Laura?
Mmm. Well, I think your nice friend Maya had her killed.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你那亲切的朋友玛雅杀了她

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
That's why I gotta get back to 2018 as soon as possible.
The jet's almost ready. I'll lay low in the shed.
translation.zh: ‎飞船基本修复好了 我会低调行事

translation.en: I'll heal for a few more days until I can get a clean read
translation.zh: ‎再休养几天 直到读数正常

translation.en: and then fly out of your life.
But going back to save her. -Talking to me. -[whines]
translation.zh: ‎但回来救她 跟我解释情况

translation.en: Everything you're doing right now just to rescue one person.
translation.zh:
‎你现在所做的一切
‎就是为了拯救一个人

translation.en: You're changing the future. That's gotta be against the rules.
translation.zh: ‎你在改变未来 这一定是违规的

translation.en: You'll feel differently when you meet her.
translation.zh: ‎等你见到她后就不会这么想了

translation.en: -And when you lose her. -What?
[shushes] Grab that bag. Get ready to run.
translation.zh: ‎怎么了？ ‎拿上包 准备逃跑

translation.en: Why? What's happening?
We're going that way. Be ready.
translation.zh: ‎我们往那个方向去 做好准备

translation.en: -Move! -[whooshing]
Stay behind me. [exhales]
Don't you do it! Don't you do it, Reed!
Wanna see something cool?
-That's a lightsaber, dude. -Quiet now.
translation.zh:
‎-这就是一把光剑 伙计
‎-闭嘴

translation.en: Time to go. Let's go.
[Sorian] Hello, Adam.
[man] Reed, don't move!
[Adam] Christos. They'll let anyone into this time stream.
translation.zh:
‎克里斯托斯
‎真是阿猫阿狗都能进这个时间流啊

translation.en: Who's that?
That's Christos. We were in the academy together.
translation.zh: ‎克里斯托斯 我们是大学同学

translation.en: He's a decent pilot but a terrible person.
translation.zh: ‎他飞行技术高超 但人品低劣

translation.en: He runs security for Sorian.
Ouchie, with the face. Did I do that?
translation.zh: ‎好痛哦 你那张脸是我打的吗？

translation.en: God, I hope the boss lets me kill you.
translation.zh: ‎老天 真希望老大允许我杀了你

translation.en: [chuckles] In fairness, though, you did shoot me first.
translation.zh: ‎公平来说 是你先开枪打我的

translation.en: On the bright side, your… your face now matches your soul.
translation.zh:
‎好的一面是
‎你的脸现在跟灵魂相配了

translation.en: -Anyone say you talk too much? -All the time.
translation.zh:
‎-有人说过你话太多吗？
‎-一直都有

translation.en: -It's come up. -[Sorian] That's enough.
Adam, before this goes any further, let's just go home, please.
translation.zh:
‎亚当 趁还没出大乱子
‎跟我回家吧 拜托了

translation.en: Uh, no! Just… just no.
So you're risking your own young life
translation.zh: ‎所以你要因为一个我不知何故

translation.en: over some paranoid delusion that I somehow killed Laura.
translation.zh: ‎杀死劳拉的妄念赔上少年时代的你

translation.en: I loved Laura. You were both like family to me.
translation.zh: ‎我那么爱劳拉 ‎你们俩就是我的家人

translation.en: I would never have hurt her. I hate that it's come to this.
translation.zh:
‎我永远不会伤害她
‎我讨厌事情发展成这步田地

translation.en: Guns.
Christos, please escort Adam back to 2050.
translation.zh: ‎克里斯托斯 请护送亚当回2050年

translation.en: -You're up. -Yeah. All right, drop the Mag-Cyl.
translation.zh:
‎-到你了
‎-对 好了 把磁力柱放下

translation.en: -This? -Yeah.
-Yeah. Okay. -All right.
Wanna start low or go high?
-[young Adam] Stop! Get off him! -[Adam groans]
-[guns power up] -[Christos] Come here!
-Move! -♪ I was told what it means ♪
-What is happening? -Dying outside your fixed time is messy.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么回事？
‎-死在自己的固定时间外很惨的

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -Saving your ass, honey. Behind you!
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么在这里？
‎-救你啊 亲爱的 小心身后！

translation.en: I can't believe…
-I can't believe you're here. -♪ Good times, bad times ♪
-Hey. -Hi.
That was awesome.
-We should go. -Yep. Let's go. Come on, come on, come on!
translation.zh:
‎-我们赶紧走吧
‎-好 我们走 快！

translation.en: Go. Go!
I knew you'd come someday. I just didn't know when.
translation.zh:
‎我就知道你会来
‎我只是不知道什么时候

translation.en: [Adam] Of course I came.
[young Adam] Eyes on the road, please.
[Adam] They said you lit up on reentry.
That's crap. I have the top reentry stats in the program.
translation.zh:
‎胡扯 整个项目里
‎我的折返成绩是最高的

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -[young Adam coughing]
Laura, this is… me.
-Hi. -Parallel contact, babe?
Well, you've always said that you wished you'd met me earlier.
translation.zh:
‎你不是一直说希望早点遇见我吗？
‎我来了

translation.en: -Here I am. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎你不是一直说希望早点遇见我吗？
‎我来了 ‎是啊

translation.en: All right, can we maybe slow down a bit now? There's no one even following us.
translation.zh:
‎好了 能开慢点吗？
‎根本没人在追我们

translation.en: Don't look back. Look up.
[Adam] Gotta get off this road. We're too exposed.
translation.zh: ‎我们得离开这条路 不然太暴露了

translation.en: Okay, baby, it's about to get busier.
translation.zh: ‎好的 宝贝 局势越来越紧张了

translation.en: Go, go, go, go, go, go, go!
Stop the car.
-What? -What?
-Stop! -[Laura yells]
Okay, back, back. Go, go, go! Reverse!
Back! Back!
Go, go, go, go!
They're leaving.
They're not leaving. They're regrouping.
translation.zh: ‎他们不是走了 而是重新整队去了

translation.en: -We have to get off this road fast. -[young Adam] What road?
translation.zh:
‎-我们得尽快离开这条路
‎-哪条路？

translation.en: [Adam] I… I don't understand. How did you find us?
translation.zh: ‎我不明白 你怎么找到我们的？

translation.en: [Laura] You don't think I'd be watching your back, even in the past?
translation.zh: ‎你以为我在过去不会照看你吗？

translation.en: [Adam] Why did you make the jump back in the first place?
translation.zh: ‎你当初为什么要穿越回过去？

translation.en: I was analyzing data when I found something strange in the jump logs.
translation.zh:
‎我本来在分析数据
‎结果发现穿越日志有些奇怪

translation.en: A time jet returning from 2018.
How's that strange?
Because no one ever flew to 2018.
[Adam] I don't get it. How did it come back if it never left?
translation.zh:
‎我不明白 既然没人去
‎它又怎么会回来？

translation.en: Unless someone went back and altered the time stream,
translation.zh: ‎除非有人回去过 改变了时间流

translation.en: so the future the jet had left from had already been changed.
translation.zh:
‎这样的话 飞船离开的未来
‎就已经是改变过的了

translation.en: God, it's like I traded my brains for those muscles.
translation.zh:
‎老天 我感觉自己用脑子
‎换了这一身肌肉

translation.en: It's a shit deal.
-Cute kid. -Precious, isn't he?
Don't you just wanna hold him underwater till the bubbles stop?
translation.zh:
‎你难道不想把他摁在水里
‎直到不再冒泡吗？

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Oh, I freakin' hate myself.
How did this happen?
[Laura] That jet that went back? It was Sorian's.
translation.zh: ‎回到过去的那架飞船？是索里兰的

translation.en: She went back to November 2018 for a reason.
translation.zh: ‎她返回2018年11月肯定是有原因的

translation.en: What happened in November 2018?
I'll tell ya. [sighs]
This happened.
Your father's magnetic particle accelerator,
The Adam Project, had just gone online.
That was the first step toward practical time travel.
translation.zh: ‎那是走向时间旅行的第一步

translation.en: Sorian must've come back to 2018
and given her younger self some kind of future intel.
translation.zh: ‎向她年轻的自己泄露了未来的天机

translation.en: What for?
My guess is enough future stock tips to amass her fortune
translation.zh:
‎我猜是足够多的股票信息
‎好让她积累财富

translation.en: and get rid of whatever political obstacles
were keeping her from gaining control of the time program.
She already had that.
But did she?
No.
No, she didn't.
No.
So this world, our world,
translation.zh: ‎所以这个世界 我们的世界

translation.en: everything has already been changed by Sorian.
translation.zh: ‎已经被索里兰改得面目全非

translation.en: And your fixed time, 2050, is it bad there?
translation.zh:
‎那你的固定时间 2050年
‎那边不怎么好吗？

translation.en: -We've seen Terminator, right? -Obviously.
translation.zh:
‎-我们看过《终结者》 对吧？
‎-明摆着嘛

translation.en: That's 2050 on a good day.
translation.zh: ‎那种情形在2050年还算是个好日子呢

translation.en: Sorian must've spotted me and planted an altitude bomb on my jet.
translation.zh:
‎索里兰一定有所觉察
‎然后在我的飞船上安装了高程炸弹

translation.en: Here, eat something.
-I managed to eject, but it didn't matter. -[mouths]
translation.zh:
‎我成功弹出 但那也没什么用 ‎因为没了飞船
‎我就只能永远被流放了

translation.en: Without my jet, I was a permanent castaway.
translation.zh:
‎因为没了飞船
‎我就只能永远被流放了

translation.en: So I had to follow protocol, you know, live out my life here,
translation.zh: ‎所以我不得不循规蹈矩 在这里过活

translation.en: avoid contact, minimize my footprint,
translation.zh: ‎避免与人接触 将足迹最小化

translation.en: and hope you were crazy enough to come look for me.
translation.zh: ‎然后希望你足够疯狂 回来找我

translation.en: Alone. All this time.
Four years.
That's the job, right?
-Yeah, but, baby-- -It's…
It's fine. I got used to being alone.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我习惯了一个人

translation.en: Not anymore.
-[sighs] -[Adam] Hey.
I found you.
-[Laura chuckles] -I found you.
You found me.
-I'll take my eyes and ears for a walk. -[Adam] Bye now.
translation.zh:
‎-我带眼睛和耳朵出去走走
‎-再见

translation.en: [young Adam] You kids have fun.
-[sighs] Hey. -Hi.
-What's wrong? -I got shot.
-You got shot? -By a gun, yeah.
-Reed? -Yeah?
-Suck it up. -Yes, ma'am.
[whispers] Yes, boss.
-You know what you have to do. -Nooooo. No, I came back for you.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道自己必须怎么做
‎-不 我是回来找你的

translation.en: I know.
But we can't have a life here. Not like this.
translation.zh: ‎但我们不能在这里生活 这样不行

translation.en: Now you have to go back to 2018, and you have to put things right.
translation.zh:
‎你现在必须回到2018年
‎你必须拨乱反正

translation.en: -You have to put an end to all this. -What do you mean "put an end to it"?
translation.zh:
‎-你必须结束这一切
‎-什么叫“结束这一切”？

translation.en: I mean, stop time travel
from ever being invented and save the future.
translation.zh: ‎阻碍时间旅行出现 拯救未来

translation.en: Fine, come with me, and we'll--
translation.zh: ‎好 那你跟我一起去 我们会…

translation.en: Your jet is meshed for your DNA. It won't fly with anyone else.
translation.zh:
‎你的飞船只认你的DNA
‎不会搭载别人的

translation.en: -You're smart. You can figure it out. -Adam!
translation.zh:
‎-你这么聪明 总能想出办法
‎-亚当！

translation.en: We meet in the program. We meet there. Do you understand that? We can't…
translation.zh:
‎我们通过项目相遇
‎我们在那边认识的 懂吗？我们不能…

translation.en: If I go back and stop time travel,
translation.zh:
‎如果我回到过去 扼杀时间旅行
‎这事儿能不能成还不一定呢

translation.en: and that's an extremely big "if" with Sorian on my ass,
translation.zh:
‎如果我回到过去 扼杀时间旅行
‎这事儿能不能成还不一定呢 ‎毕竟索里兰一直对我穷追猛打

translation.en: we never meet.
We never happen.
We never happen, Laura.
translation.zh: ‎我们就不会产生羁绊了 劳拉

translation.en: We did happen.
Every moment we ever had will always have happened.
translation.zh:
‎我们有过的每一份羁绊
‎还是会照样产生

translation.en: Even if we correct the time stream,
somewhere in us will be the echo of this one.
translation.zh:
‎我们的羁绊
‎还是会在别的时间线里回响

translation.en: And we will find each other.
I really believe that.
What if we don't? What if… what if you're wrong? And you're probably wrong.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们找不到呢？如果你错了呢？
‎你很有可能是错的

translation.en: When am I ever wrong?
-Hey, hey. -[sobs] I can't do this again, okay?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我没办法再承受一次 好吗？

translation.en: I can't do this again, please. I can't afford to lose you. Don't do this.
translation.zh:
‎我真的没办法 拜托了
‎我不能失去你 别这样

translation.en: What is that?
They found us.
[gasping] Damn it!
There's a dirt road around the bend.
translation.zh:
‎转弯处有一条土路
‎我会拖延时间 让你找到飞船

translation.en: -I'll buy you time to get to your jet. -No, no, no. Hey. I'm not leaving.
translation.zh:
‎转弯处有一条土路
‎我会拖延时间 让你找到飞船 ‎不行 我不走

translation.en: -You have to. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh:
‎-不行 你必须走
‎-你在说什么？他们会杀了你

translation.en: -Those guys'll kill you. -No! I've had years--
translation.zh:
‎-不行 你必须走
‎-你在说什么？他们会杀了你 ‎不会 我多年来一直在设置防线
‎我绝对会杀他们个措手不及

translation.en: I've had years to rig my defenses. They'll never see me coming.
translation.zh:
‎不会 我多年来一直在设置防线
‎我绝对会杀他们个措手不及

translation.en: -If they catch you, it's over. -That's the only reason--
translation.zh:
‎-但他们要是抓到你 就全完了
‎-我因为你才…

translation.en: Adam! Stop it! Please. [sobs]
I know you came for me.
[sobbing] Now you have to leave for me, please.
translation.zh: ‎你现在必须为了我离开 求你了

translation.en: Please.
[whispers] We can fix this.
Hey, I love you.
That's why I know you're gonna find me again.
translation.zh: ‎所以我知道你肯定能再次找到我

translation.en: Go.
Go!
God damn it!
Come on.
Come on.
Boom.
[Adam] Jet's not reading me because of my vitals. I'll need your DNA to start her up.
translation.zh:
‎我生命体征还没恢复 飞船不认我
‎我需要用你的DNA启动它

translation.en: When we get to altitude, the bio stop will come down, and then I can take over.
translation.zh:
‎等我们到了高空 生物数据会下降
‎我就能接手了

translation.en: We have to move fast, or they'll be on us before we can jump to 2018.
translation.zh:
‎我们得快点 不然还没穿越到2018年
‎他们就追上我们了

translation.en: -Wait. What? I'm not coming with you. -Yes, you are. Let's go. We need to go.
translation.zh: ‎什么？我不要跟你去 ‎不 你必须去 走吧 我们得赶紧

translation.en: [Laura] Christos!
-[panting] -It's good to see you, buddy.
Laura, is that you?
You're not still mad at me for blowing up your jet, are you?
translation.zh:
‎你不会还在因为
‎我炸掉你的飞船生气吧？

translation.en: If I'm being honest, yeah, I'm still kinda pissed.
translation.zh:
‎要是说实话 没错
‎我现在火气还很大呢

translation.en: Will you stop and listen to me?
This is my fixed time. You already had my childhood.
translation.zh:
‎这里是我的固定时间
‎你已经经历了我的童年

translation.en: You had adventures, you flew planes,
and I'm still the nerd with an inhaler who gets his ass kicked.
translation.zh:
‎但我却还是那个经常挨揍
‎需要随身携带吸入器的呆子

translation.en: I want the rest of it.
-Want the rest? -Yeah.
Here's the rest of it. Dad's death screws you up more than you ever realize.
translation.zh:
‎我来跟你说说全部 爸爸的死
‎给你造成的创伤要远超你的想象

translation.en: You get depressed. You get angry.
You wander around school without making a social dent.
translation.zh: ‎你在高中里瞎转悠 不跟人接触

translation.en: College is a high point, until after a year, you lose your scholarship
translation.zh:
‎大学是你的高光时刻
‎直到你因为一个

translation.en: for something that is so unbelievably stupid
translation.zh: ‎滑天下之大稽的原因丢掉奖学金

translation.en: I cannot even say it out loud right now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在都没脸告诉你到底是为什么

translation.en: You end up in the air force. Turns out you could really fly.
translation.zh:
‎你后来进了空军
‎证明了自己优秀的飞行能力

translation.en: And then along comes time travel, and the whole world starts to fall apart
translation.zh:
‎然后时间旅行被发明出来
‎整个世界开始分崩离析

translation.en: until the only woman you have…
the only woman you ever loved gets taken away.
translation.zh: ‎你唯一爱过的女人有去无回

translation.en: Do you understand me?
Till you lose…
She… she just gets taken away.
-There's gotta be more than that. -[Adam] There is, kid.
translation.zh:
‎肯定不只是你说的这些 ‎没错 孩子
‎但拜索里兰所赐 全都是糟心事

translation.en: And thanks to Sorian, none of it's good.
translation.zh:
‎没错 孩子
‎但拜索里兰所赐 全都是糟心事

translation.en: We can fix it.
-By destroying time travel? -That's right.
How are we gonna do that? What's your plan?
translation.zh: ‎你打算怎么做？有什么计划吗？

translation.en: I'm not gonna explain my plan to a nerd with an inhaler--
translation.zh:
‎我才不要跟一个离不开吸入器的呆子
‎解释自己的计划…

translation.en: -You don't have a plan. -Because I do not have a plan. -Exactly. -That is correct.
translation.zh:
‎-你没有计划
‎-我没有计划 没错

translation.en: But I know somebody who might.
translation.zh: ‎但我知道一个人 他或许有

translation.en: Dad.
Dad.
You're gonna find Dad.
[Adam] Nope.
We're gonna find Dad.
So are you in or are you--
Tell your husband to get his bitch ass out here.
translation.zh: ‎让你那胆小鬼丈夫赶紧出来

translation.en: He's busy right now,
but I'll tell him you stopped by.
Hello, Laura.
You should have stayed dead the first time.
Now, where is your husband?
[Adam panting] Okay.
Here we go. All right, give me your hand.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 好的 把你的手给我

translation.en: -[whirring] -Like that, yep.
Nice, healthy DNA right there.
Okay, we'll park it down there,
translation.zh: ‎好的 我们要穿越回去了

translation.en: grab on to that railing,
hold on for dear life, and try not to pass out from the G's, okay?
translation.zh: ‎握紧不放 尽量别被重力场冲晕

translation.en: What's a… Jesus!
-What's happening? -That.
[young Adam yelps] What are you doing?
Gotcha!
I told you to hang on.
Don't give me that stink eye.
Where you going?
Shit!
[Adam] Okay, hold tight. I've always wanted to try this.
translation.zh: ‎好了 抓紧 我一直想试试这么玩

translation.en: [young Adam] Did you just turn the plane off?
[Adam] Yes, I did.
[young Adam] Oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God,
oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God,
Where the hell are they?
-[Christos] They gotta be here somewhere. -[Sorian] Adam, check your ion readings.
translation.zh: ‎肯定就在这附近 ‎亚当 你看看飞船上的离子读数

translation.en: The reactor's damaged.
You have one jump left.
If you don't come back now, you never will.
translation.zh: ‎如果现在不回来 ‎就永远回不来了

translation.en: What do you say, kid? Your call.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么想 孩子？你来决定

translation.en: We don't pull this off, we're not gettin' back, either one of us.
translation.zh:
‎我们要是不能成功完成任务
‎那咱俩都回不去了

translation.en: -Punch that shit. -Oh yeah!
translation.zh:
‎-给我把油门踩到最大
‎-没问题！

translation.en: Gotcha.
-♪ Well, my temperature's rising… ♪ -Come on!
-♪ Crazy people knockin'… ♪ -Adam! I got this.
Come on, Reed. Come on.
-[young Adam] Adam! -[Adam] I got it! -Adam! -I got it!
-[young Adam] Adam! -♪ So glad we made it… ♪
Come on!
-Let's not… -[alarm bleeping]
Die!
[man] It's not meant to be easy.
Listen, guys, instead of moaning about it,
give yourself permission to be inadequate, and then get to work.
translation.zh:
‎不如允许自己尚有缺失
‎然后努力弥补

translation.en: You can't be good at something unless you're willing to be… -[blows raspberry] …at it first. -[laughter]
-Professor Reed. -Sophie.
It'll take two semesters just to begin solving that.
translation.zh:
‎要花两个学期的时间
‎才只能解决一些皮毛问题

translation.en: [Louis] Oh, good God, at least that.
[Sophie] Even then, we'll fail the class, because this is bonkers.
translation.zh:
‎即便如此 我们还是会挂科
‎因为这简直是天方夜谭

translation.en: [Louis] Sophie, you can do this.
Listen, guys, that is the beauty of physics.
translation.zh: ‎大家听着 这就是物理学之美

translation.en: [voice fading] That is the beauty of life…
It's really him.
-Yep. -[Louis] If you think you've got…
He's so…
[Adam] Yeah.
Alive. Come here for a second. Hey.
translation.zh: ‎生龙活虎 你过来一下 嘿

translation.en: -Let me do the talking in there. -We have to tell him what happens.
translation.zh: ‎让我进去跟他说 ‎我们得告诉他 他就不用死了

translation.en: -He doesn't have to die. -We say nothing, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我们得告诉他 他就不用死了 ‎什么都不能说 好吗？

translation.en: Only what he needs to know. Everything else… we can't.
translation.zh:
‎只说他需要知道的事
‎至于其他事…我们不能说

translation.en: I wanna hear you say it, "I won't tell him." Say it.
translation.zh:
‎我希望你说给我听
‎“我不会告诉他” 快说

translation.en: -Say it. -I won't tell him.
Physics is a slog. It's a slog.
translation.zh: ‎物理学不是朝夕之功 心急不得

translation.en: We are meant to work on problems that our children will solve.
translation.zh:
‎我们注定要研究
‎子孙后代才能解决的问题

translation.en: You might find the odd solution here or there.
translation.zh: ‎你们或许能时不时求出奇数解

translation.en: I just got your shirt, by the way. It's very clever.
translation.zh: ‎对了 我刚看懂你的T恤 很机智

translation.en: But you will die before your life's work is done.
translation.zh:
‎但在毕生的工作出成果之前
‎你们就会化作一缕青烟

translation.en: Your cold, lifeless husk will be moldering in the ground
translation.zh:
‎你们了无生机的冰冷肉体
‎会在地下腐烂

translation.en: while generations that come after you
will be finishing the work that you started.
To quote the Romans,
"Enjoy yourselves. It's later than you think."
[Adam] Guy Lombardo.
-I am s… I'm sorry? -[Adam] Guy Lombardo. That was… Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎我很…你说什么？ ‎盖伊隆巴尔多

translation.en: The quote, um… "It's later than you think." It's not the Romans.
translation.zh: ‎“时不我待”这句话不是出自罗马人

translation.en: It's a singer. Guy Lombardo and his Royal Canadians.
translation.zh:
‎是一个歌手写的
‎盖伊隆巴尔多及其皇家加拿大人乐队

translation.en: It was Guy Lombardo,
and it was from his 1949 classic, "Enjoy Yourself."
translation.zh:
‎这句歌词来自他1949年的经典老歌
‎《享受人生》

translation.en: But long before that,
it was the Romans who etched it on their sundials.
translation.zh:
‎罗马人就已经把这句话
‎刻在了他们的日晷上

translation.en: So, uh… so we're both right.
It's interesting that you, uh… you know that.
translation.zh: ‎你居然知道此事 很不简单

translation.en: I'm sorry, do I know you?
Just auditing the class. [chuckles]
Any other questions?
All right, the, uh, reading's on my website, and I'll see you Tuesday.
translation.zh:
‎好了 阅读材料在我的网站上
‎我们周二见

translation.en: Adam?
Dad.
Dad.
[Louis] Adam?
Is… is this time travel?
-[Louis] He came from 2050 and got you? -[young Adam] Yes.
translation.zh: ‎所以他从2050年回来 然后接上了你 ‎对

translation.en: -How old are you now? -[young Adam] Twelve.
-Why did you need your 12-year-old self? -[Adam] I didn't.
translation.zh:
‎-你干吗会需要12岁的自己？
‎-我不需要他

translation.en: -You needed me to fly the jet. -Jet? There… there's a jet?
translation.zh:
‎-他需要我驾驶飞船
‎-飞船？有飞船吗？

translation.en: -My jet. -Oh. What I meant was I didn't need you originally.
translation.zh:
‎我的飞船 我的意思是
‎一开始我没想着用你

translation.en: -2022 was a mistake. -Wh--
And you flew this jet?
-Yes. -Did you, though?
-Is that my jacket? Looks tight on you. -That's what I said.
translation.zh:
‎-那是我的外套吗？你穿起来有点紧
‎-我就那么说的

translation.en: -It's fine. -Like a condom with buttons.
translation.zh:
‎-没关系
‎-看起来像带扣子的避孕套

translation.en: -This is fun. I'm having fun, are you? -Condom!
translation.zh:
‎-我还挺开心的 你呢？
‎-避孕套

translation.en: And why was 2022 a mistake?
-I wasn't supposed to be there. -You're not supposed to be here.
translation.zh:
‎-我不该去到那里的
‎-你还不该来这里呢

translation.en: -You don't say. -They shot him when he stole the jet.
translation.zh:
‎-这不明摆着吗
‎-他偷飞船时中枪了

translation.en: -Please don't tell him that. -You stole a jet?
translation.zh:
‎-拜托别告诉他这个
‎-你偷了飞船？

translation.en: -Why would he need to know that? -Okay, stop. Both of you stop talking now.
translation.zh:
‎-他为何需要知道那件事？
‎-好了 够了 你俩都别说了

translation.en: Do you realize how absolutely wrong this is?
You can't be here. You can't be anywhere but your own timeline.
translation.zh:
‎你不能来这里
‎你只能待在自己的时间线里

translation.en: What do you think we're doin' here? Think we're short of hugs in the future?
translation.zh:
‎你以为我们来这里做什么？
‎觉得我们在未来很缺爱吗？

translation.en: -There's a reason I need to talk to you. -I don't-- I don't care.
translation.zh:
‎-我想找你聊 肯定是事出有因
‎-我不在乎

translation.en: -He doesn't care. -Don't get me wrong.
I'm very happy to see you, and I mean this in the best possible way,
translation.zh:
‎我很高兴见到你
‎而且我这话完全是好意

translation.en: but you need to piss off to where you came from.
translation.zh: ‎但你得赶紧滚回自己的老家

translation.en: Anything you say or do could cause a divergence.
translation.zh:
‎不管你说什么 做什么
‎都有可能引发偏离

translation.en: Can you please shut up for a second?
-I'm not gonna listen-- -For a second and listen.
translation.zh:
‎-我不要听…
‎-先把嘴闭上听我说

translation.en: -Shut the physics fountain in your face. -What you are doing is reckless.
translation.zh: ‎关闭你脸上的物理喷泉 ‎爸爸！

translation.en: [young Adam] You okay?
-God damn it! -[groaning]
-[Adam] In fairness, I-- -It's okay. I asked him nicely to shut up and listen.
translation.zh:
‎说句公道话
‎我刚才可是对他好言相劝

translation.en: -He did no such thing, so… -It's okay. It's fine. I'm fine.
translation.zh:
‎-他没听我的闭上嘴 所以…
‎-没关系 我没事

translation.en: That's what you get. We don't hit people in this family.
translation.zh:
‎这就是你的下场
‎我们家的人从不动粗

translation.en: What was that?
-That's what you get. -God!
How did you turn out to be an asshole? I thought you loved me.
translation.zh:
‎你怎么长成了一个混蛋？
‎我还以为你爱我

translation.en: -I do! -None of it matters anymore.
-Are you kidding me? Of course it matters. -Dad.
translation.zh:
‎你在开玩笑吗？当然重要 ‎-爸爸
‎-当然重要

translation.en: They don't have safeguards where you come from? -Dad. -Protocols?
translation.zh:
‎你来的地方没有安保吗？
‎没有规程吗？

translation.en: -Maya and I agreed. -Dad.
-There'd be an ethics panel-- -Dad!
With real oversight.
None of it matters anymore.
Wait. It already happened? Somebody already altered time?
translation.zh:
‎等一下 已经发生了吗？
‎已经有人更改了时间？

translation.en: -Who? -Sorian.
-Maya? -Maya.
She'd never do that. She knows the consequences.
translation.zh: ‎她绝不会这么做 她知道后果

translation.en: -She's been funding my work for years. -The Adam Project.
translation.zh:
‎-多年来一直是她资助我的研究
‎-亚当项目

translation.en: Yes, I theorized that with a powerful enough pulse,
translation.zh:
‎对 根据我的理论
‎如果有一股足够强劲的脉冲

translation.en: we could generate utilitarian wormholes in space.
translation.zh: ‎我们就能在太空中制造虫洞

translation.en: And we did it four weeks ago.
But I was… I was just playing with the theory
translation.zh: ‎但可以利用虫洞时间旅行的理论

translation.en: that you can use wormholes for time travel.
That part's theoretical.
-Right. -Still theoretical.
This theory needs to take a leak. So let's go.
translation.zh: ‎那本理论需要放个水 我们走

translation.en: Holy shit! I'm the godfather of time travel?
Nice hit, Dad.
[whispers] I think I broke my hand.
[Louis] I'm… I'm sorry. This is my fault.
My… my ego. My hubris.
My need to be best, to be first, to be the smartest guy in the room.
translation.zh:
‎我需要鹤立鸡群 争当第一
‎不甘人后的虚荣心

translation.en: And here we are.
-A disgusting character flaw. -He didn't know.
translation.zh:
‎-令人厌恶的性格缺陷
‎-你又不知道

translation.en: -[Louis] But I should have. -Yeah.
Mankind has no business tampering with the mechanics of the universe.
There are forces greater than science.
Right. That's why we're gonna put the genie back in the bottle.
translation.zh: ‎对 所以我们要从源头入手

translation.en: Destroy time travel before it's even invented.
translation.zh: ‎把时间旅行扼杀在萌芽阶段

translation.en: What's done, no matter how terrible,
should not and cannot be undone under any circumstance.
translation.zh: ‎在任何情况下 都不能更改扭转

translation.en: Even us being here, talking like this, we're perverting fate and time.
translation.zh:
‎就连我们在这里聊这件事
‎就是在误导命运和时间

translation.en: I told you Sorian already did that. She's had the world by the balls since.
translation.zh:
‎我告诉过你 索里兰已经那么做了
‎从那之后 她就玩弄世界于股掌之间

translation.en: And you know that for a fact?
Do you have scientific proof that she changed things?
translation.zh: ‎你有科学证据表明她更改了时间吗？

translation.en: No, you don't because you can't know. But I will tell you this.
translation.zh:
‎你没有 因为你不可能知道
‎但你听好了

translation.en: You being here opens up the potential for catastrophic reconfiguration.
translation.zh:
‎你来到这里 就有可能导致
‎灾难性的重构

translation.en: -And that is quantifiable, that-- -Stop. Stop.
translation.zh:
‎可以量化的重构 ‎-打住
‎-打住什么？

translation.en: -Stop. -Stop what?
-Stop being a scientist. -But I am a scient--
translation.zh:
‎-别再一副科学家的模样
‎-但我就是科学家…

translation.en: Be a father.
You were always more interested in the universe than your son.
translation.zh: ‎你对宇宙的兴趣向来超过对儿子的

translation.en: -That's not true. -[Adam] That is true.
And when you're older, you'll realize that. It--
You know what? It's…
That ship has sailed. It's too late for me. So, you know, whatever. I'm fine.
translation.zh: ‎覆水难收 我已经没救了 所以随便吧 ‎我无所谓

translation.en: But he needs you.
And you? What do you need?
I need to go for a walk.
I can't be here, Adam. I… I have to go.
translation.zh: ‎我不能留在这里 亚当 我得走了

translation.en: -Please don't go. -I have to.
-Please. -This is… this is bigger than any of us.
translation.zh:
‎-拜托了
‎-这不止关乎到我们三个

translation.en: It's too dangerous what he's asking me to do. I can't.
translation.zh: ‎他让我做的事太危险了 我不能做

translation.en: All right. We'll see each other again.
Wait.
-I need to tell you something. -No, you can't say anything else to me.
translation.zh:
‎-我需要告诉你一件事
‎-不 你不能告诉我别的事

translation.en: I can't know the future.
I'm sorry.
I have to go home. Your mom and you are waiting.
translation.zh: ‎我得回家了 你和你妈妈在等着

translation.en: [woman] Yes, Senator.
Except the stability of these wormholes is no longer a hypothetical,
translation.zh: ‎这些虫洞的稳定性已经不再是假设

translation.en: and the work we are doing here is simply ahead of the current statutes.
translation.zh: ‎我们的研究不过是有点超前

translation.en: So you can either support my program and be a part of the future,
translation.zh:
‎所以你要么支持我的项目
‎成为未来的一份子

translation.en: or you can get left behind in the past.
[Sorian] Hang up the phone.
What are you doing here? You said I wouldn't be seeing you again.
translation.zh:
‎你怎么来了？
‎你说过我们不会再见面

translation.en: Did I? Hmm.
When was that? Remind me.
[Maya] The last time you just showed up, two months ago.
translation.zh: ‎你上一次突然到访 两个月前时

translation.en: Oh, well, for me, it was 32 years ago.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 对我来说 那是32年前的事了

translation.en: So sorry if I'm a little fuzzy on the details.
translation.zh: ‎如果我没记清楚细节 请你见谅

translation.en: Anyway, times have changed.
You can't be here.
You know the potential for catastrophic changes to the time stream.
translation.zh:
‎你知道这可能会给现在的时间流
‎带来灾难性后果

translation.en: -It's incalculable. -God, I was such a nerd.
Will you please just stop talking? Everything you asked me to do.
translation.zh:
‎-你能闭嘴吗？
‎-你让我做的所有那些事

translation.en: The stock buys, the offshore accounts, all of it. It's unethical.
translation.zh:
‎购买股票 离岸账户
‎所有那些事有违伦理

translation.en: -And illegal. -This isn't a joke. It's dangerous.
translation.zh: ‎而且也违法 ‎这不是闹着玩 很危险的

translation.en: The environmental impact alone from the companies you had me pick
translation.zh:
‎单单是你让我选的那些公司
‎造成的环境损害

translation.en: could be devastating.
In fairness to us,
translation.zh: ‎公平来说 我们插手之前

translation.en: the environment was pretty much toast before we came along.
translation.zh: ‎公平来说 我们插手之前 ‎环境就已经被糟蹋烂了

translation.en: And by the way, Maya, you did it, all of it,
translation.zh: ‎还有 玛雅 你全照我说的做了

translation.en: because somewhere inside that cheap suit and ridiculous ponytail is me.
translation.zh:
‎因为穿那身廉价套装
‎扎傻气马尾的人到底还是我

translation.en: I'm leaving.
Where you going?
You seeing someone?
No, you're not. You're too busy.
translation.zh: ‎不 你没有 你太忙了

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Thing is, you always will be.
translation.zh: ‎问题是 你会永远忙得支不开身

translation.en: This company is all you will ever have.
translation.zh: ‎这家公司会是你唯一的陪伴

translation.en: -[sighs] -It is your personal life.
It's your family.
But this is our legacy.
And if we had let the government take it from us,
then everything we sacrificed,
all that loneliness,
all that loneliness,
would've been for nothing.
And I did it.
I fixed that future where we had been forgotten.
translation.zh: ‎我修复了我们被遗忘的未来

translation.en: Then why are you back here now?
I'm back
because we can't control time travel if it never existed.
translation.zh:
‎是因为如果时间旅行从不存在
‎我们就无从控制它

translation.en: And your buddy Adam Reed is about to betray you.
translation.zh: ‎你的小伙伴亚当里德就要背叛你了

translation.en: Adam? He's just a little kid.
Yeah, well, that little kid…
[laughs] …he grows up to be a very big pain in our ass.
translation.zh: ‎他长大后可是个让我们头疼的烦人精

translation.en: [sighs] Trust me. You're gonna want this.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 你会需要喝一杯

translation.en: What?
I know you think you know more than me because you're older.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你因为比我年长
‎就自诩比我知道的多

translation.en: Go away, Adam. [sighs]
And I know why you hate him so much.
Really?
[laughs] Well, do tell. I'm on the edge of my seat here.
translation.zh: ‎那你快说说 我侧耳恭听

translation.en: Holy shit. I wonder what it i-- Was it because he's narcissistic,
translation.zh:
‎老天 我还在想是怎么…
‎是因为他太自恋

translation.en: or, uh, never came home from work or cared more about his job than his son--
translation.zh:
‎还是永远都在工作
‎还是比起儿子 更关心工作…

translation.en: It's because he died.
You hate him
because he died.
You made yourself hate him
because it was easier than missing him.
translation.zh: ‎是因为这要比想念他更简单

translation.en: And I remember some stuff that you maybe don't wanna.
translation.zh: ‎我还能记起一些或许你不愿记起的事

translation.en: Oh yeah?
Like what?
He played catch with us almost every night.
translation.zh: ‎他几乎每晚都跟我们玩接球

translation.en: Catch.
He'd get home from work,
be so tired, and I'd be in the yard throwing the ball against the pitch back.
translation.zh:
‎身心俱疲 我会在院子里
‎对着投球练习器投球

translation.en: -You remember the pitch back, right? -Oh, I… I remember the pitch back.
translation.zh: ‎你还记得那个投球练习器吧？ ‎我记得那个投球练习器

translation.en: Yeah, he bought it so he didn't have to play with me.
translation.zh:
‎对 他买那个给我
‎就是为了不陪我玩

translation.en: Nope.
He bought it because they had one in the window of Altman's.
translation.zh:
‎他买回来是因为
‎奥特曼百货的橱窗里摆了一个

translation.en: And every time we passed that store,
I begged him to buy it for me,
so that's what Dad did.
He'd see me throwin' in the yard, and no matter how tired he was,
translation.zh: ‎他看到我在院子里扔球 不管有多累

translation.en: he'd always grab his mitt to come out for a catch.
translation.zh: ‎他都会拿上手套 出来跟我玩接球

translation.en: Things happened to you, to us.
translation.zh: ‎你和我都遭遇了不痛快的事

translation.en: And we suck at dealing with it.
I'm starting to think it's something we do.
translation.zh: ‎我开始觉得这是我们的习惯

translation.en: I give Mom a hard time now, and…
I think…
I think it's easier to be angry than it is to be sad.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得愤怒要比难过简单得多

translation.en: And I guess, when I get older,
I forget that there's a difference.
How'd you get to be so smart?
How'd you get to be so dumb?
Nice try, asshole.
[Ellie] Adam, make sure you feed Hawking before you leave for school, honey.
translation.zh: ‎亚当 你上学前一定要喂霍金 亲爱的

translation.en: -You're still here. -[Louis] Oh. And you're cooking. What are you making? Hi.
translation.zh:
‎你还在家 而且在做饭
‎你在做什么？嗨

translation.en: Uh, I know you like the Denver omelet.
That's not a Denver omelet. That is a cry for help.
translation.zh: ‎这不是丹佛蛋卷 是求救信号

translation.en: The eggs are burnt, and the bacon's still somehow totally raw.
translation.zh:
‎鸡蛋煎焦了
‎培根不知为何还完全是生的

translation.en: Oh, you… Oh, no, no. No, no, no. Wha--
Do you wanna talk about why you're still here
translation.zh: ‎你要不要聊聊怎么还在家里

translation.en: instead of being at work?
I… I… Well, I just wanted to stay home with you today.
You don't say. I like this guy.
translation.zh: ‎这还用说嘛 我喜欢这个男人

translation.en: This guy likes you.
What's going on with you, honey?
Does he seem, uh… does he seem sad to you?
No.
He's an odd duck, like his dad.
translation.zh: ‎他跟他爸爸一样 是个怪人

translation.en: I happen to collect odd ducks.
I don't know if I should've built that game for him.
translation.zh: ‎我不确定该不该为他开发那个游戏

translation.en: Shouldn't he be outside, playing with the rest of the kids?
translation.zh: ‎他不该像其他孩子一样在外面玩吗？

translation.en: How is he gonna find his place in the world?
translation.zh: ‎不然他以后要如何找到立足之地？

translation.en: "His place in the world"? He's a kid. We're his place in the world.
translation.zh:
‎“立足之地”？
‎他还是孩子 我们就是他的立足之地

translation.en: You're his place in the world.
[sighs] Okay, whatever is going on, listen, I can tell you the truth
translation.zh:
‎好了 不管是怎么回事
‎听着 我可以跟你说实话

translation.en: or something that's gonna make you feel better.
translation.zh: ‎或我可以随便说几句话安慰你

translation.en: I'd rather cut to it and tell you the truth, if you're up for it.
translation.zh: ‎我更愿意不绕弯子 直接说实话

translation.en: I… I'd rather something that'll make me feel better.
translation.zh:
‎我更愿意你说几句 ‎-安慰我的话
‎-好 我知道

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah, I know.
Kidding. Sort of. Okay, tell me.
translation.zh: ‎我开玩笑吧 算是吧 好吧 告诉我

translation.en: When you are with us… [clicks tongue]
…you're with us 100%.
It's amazing.
And when you're not… [laughs] …it's like… pfft.
translation.zh: ‎你不在我们身边时 感觉…

translation.en: So is he a little lonely?
Yeah, probably.
But does that make you a shitty guy? No.
translation.zh: ‎但你这样就一无是处了吗？不是的

translation.en: I've gotta do better.
Hey, buddy, I have good news for you.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 伙计 我告诉你一个好消息

translation.en: He doesn't need perfect. He just needs you.
translation.zh: ‎他不需要完美 他只需要你

translation.en: Your cooking makes you a borderline serial killer,
translation.zh: ‎你的厨艺差点把你打造成连环杀手

translation.en: but the rest of you is pretty awesome.
translation.zh: ‎但你在其他方面做得非常好

translation.en: Ellie.
You know I love you.
Yeah, I know.
I'm extremely lovable.
Yeah.
I have to go to work.
Okay, okay, okay.
-And, hey, you got time. -[sighs]
"It's later than you think."
[young Adam] Really think we can?
Maybe, maybe not. We'll see.
translation.zh: ‎或许能 或许不能 看情况吧

translation.en: But we're gonna try anyway.
Destroy time travel. How will we do that?
translation.zh: ‎毁掉时间旅行 我们要怎么做到？

translation.en: This is the world's largest electromagnetic accelerator.
translation.zh: ‎这是全世界最大的电磁加速器

translation.en: It's 2018, so EM technology isn't stable yet.
translation.zh:
‎现在是2018年
‎所以电磁技术还不稳定

translation.en: So here's what we're gonna do. We're gonna blow this bitch up.
translation.zh:
‎所以我们要这么做
‎我们要炸飞这玩意

translation.en: -Blow it up? -Yep.
How did I live this long? That's a terrible idea.
translation.zh: ‎我怎么会活到现在？这主意烂到家了

translation.en: Yeah, well, when a bad idea is the only idea, it becomes a great idea.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 如果烂主意是唯一的主意
‎那它就会是好主意

translation.en: Who said that?
You. Nine years from now, right before you get arrested.
translation.zh: ‎你 九年后被逮捕前的你

translation.en: -What? -Try to focus.
We'll have to deal with security. You know this bag of toys you love?
translation.zh:
‎我们得对付安保人员
‎还记得这袋你超爱的玩具吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Being a geek is about to pay off.
-Reading me? -[young Adam] Roger that, Red Leader.
translation.zh: ‎能听到我吗？ ‎收到 里德老大

translation.en: This is Butternut Sippy Cup. Ten-four, over.
translation.zh: ‎我是灰胡桃鸭嘴杯 收到 完毕

translation.en: Let's just talk like normal people, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我们还是正常说话 好吗？

translation.en: [young Adam] Copy that…
Red Leader.
Somethin's wrong.
There's nobody here.
Which means they're here.
Sorian warned her younger self we were coming.
translation.zh:
‎索里兰已经提醒了年轻时的她
‎我们要动手

translation.en: Are you sure?
Oh, pretty sure.
-Don't move. On your knees. -I'm sorry. What?
translation.zh: ‎别动 跪下 ‎抱歉 什么？

translation.en: We're taking you back to 2050, Reed.
I can't hear you through the helmet. It muffles a bit. It's hard to hear you.
translation.zh:
‎你戴着头盔我听不清
‎声音有点挡住了 我很难听清

translation.en: Don't get me wrong, your outfits are incredible though.
translation.zh:
‎别误会我的意思
‎但你们这身行头相当酷

translation.en: They're intimidating but also scream, "Please don't hurt me."
translation.zh:
‎既吓人 但同时也在喊：
‎“拜托别伤害我”

translation.en: [soldier] On your knees. I won't tell you again.
translation.zh: ‎跪下 我不会再说第二遍

translation.en: Well, you… you're right about that.
Adam, what are you doing? I'm about to get my ass kicked.
translation.zh: ‎亚当 你在干吗？我要挨揍了

translation.en: Don't worry. He doesn't wanna fight.
They wanna fight. They really, really wanna fight.
translation.zh: ‎他们想打架 他们真的想打

translation.en: Just look him in the eyes and smile.
Smile in a way that says, "I want this."
"I've been waiting my whole life for this."
Then hit him in the private bathing suit parts.
-Adam! -Roger that.
Yeah!
Adam, you're on those cars, right?
translation.zh: ‎亚当 你在对付那些车吧？

translation.en: Roger that, middle-aged Adam.
Bye. Pfft.
Adam!
That was invigorating!
-Dad? -Dad?
-I'm sorry. Are you okay? -This close!
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 你没事吧？
‎-就差这一点！

translation.en: -That was amazing. -This close!
-Where's little Adam? -He's fine!
-Hey, hey! -Hey? That's your mother's car.
The car?
What are you doin' here?
I went to the motel, and when I didn't find you there,
translation.zh: ‎我去了汽车旅馆 发现你们没在

translation.en: I… I figured I'd find you here.
translation.zh: ‎就想着应该能在这里找到你们

translation.en: It's not like you're keeping a low profile, obviously.
What the hell is this?
Tell you what? You come up with a plan, and we'll do it your way. Sound good?
translation.zh:
‎听着 你想个计划出来
‎我们按你的行动 好吗？

translation.en: Oh God. Thank God. There's a plan.
translation.zh: ‎老天 谢天谢地 你还有计划啊

translation.en: I was beginning to think you were making this up as you went along.
translation.zh: ‎我都开始想你是走一步看一步了

translation.en: Adam, I'm goin' inside. Cover the perimeter.
translation.zh: ‎亚当 我要进去了 你盯好外面

translation.en: -No one gets in behind me. -Sorry. That was harsh.
translation.zh:
‎-不许让任何人跟着我
‎-抱歉 这话有点过分了

translation.en: Roger Dodger.
[Adam] Harsh? You shaved my ass with a Subaru.
translation.zh: ‎过分？你差点开一辆斯巴鲁撞死我

translation.en: I… I saved your ass with a Subaru, son.
translation.zh: ‎我是开一辆斯巴鲁救了你 儿子

translation.en: What's Dad doing?
-Dad's being critical. Big surprise. -Okay, I--
translation.zh:
‎-他在鸡蛋里挑骨头 惊喜吧
‎-好吧 我…

translation.en: You're trying to break into a highly sensitive, secure facility
translation.zh:
‎你要带一个六年级小孩
‎闯入一个高度敏感

translation.en: with a sixth-grader. I am not being critical. I'm… I'm narrating.
translation.zh:
‎戒备森严的地方
‎我不是鸡蛋里挑骨头 只是陈述事实

translation.en: Will you just stop? Stop. Where the hell are you going?
translation.zh:
‎你能站住吗？给我站住
‎你到底要干吗？

translation.en: To destroy your accelerator, and I'm gonna enjoy it.
translation.zh:
‎毁掉你的加速器
‎我一定会舒坦到不行

translation.en: Do you realize that you have broken every rule?
translation.zh: ‎你知道自己违背了所有准则吗？

translation.en: You've blown past every conceivable ethical boundary like it wasn't there.
translation.zh:
‎你绕开了所有可以想象的道德边界
‎好像它们不存在一样

translation.en: Yeah? Then why are you here, Dad?
translation.zh: ‎是吗？那你怎么来了 爸爸？

translation.en: Because you can't do it without me.
Some people dream of the future.
Here at Sorian Technologies, we're building it.
translation.zh: ‎在索里兰技术公司 我们创建未来

translation.en: [Louis] If you destroy the accelerator, Sorian will simply rebuild it.
translation.zh: ‎就算你毁掉加速器 索里兰重建就好

translation.en: -[Adam] So what will work? -[Louis] What you're after is ISPCA.
Infinitely Shifting Plasma Containing Algorithm,
which I designed to stabilize the wormholes.
That is the mathematical equation that will make time travel possible.
translation.zh: ‎这是让时间旅行成为现实的数学等式

translation.en: How do you destroy math?
I've never written the algorithm down or demonstrated it to another human being,
translation.zh:
‎我从未将算法写下
‎也没有给其他人看过

translation.en: so it lives here in the old bean,
and in the subbasement in a diamond-hard neuromorphic processor.
translation.zh:
‎以及地下二层
‎一个钻石般坚硬的神经处理器里

translation.en: Are you talking about your penis?
Can… can we be serious now?
Yes. No. Yes.
-It's a hard drive, okay? -[chuckles]
-God, you're such a child. -Sorry.
There is a crystal hard drive running the algorithm in a closed loop.
translation.zh:
‎在一个闭合回路里
‎有个运行算法的水晶硬盘

translation.en: That is the nerve center of the accelerator.
So we go there, destroy the hard drive, prevent time travel from being invented.
translation.zh:
‎所以我们下去毁掉硬盘
‎阻止时间旅行被发明出来

translation.en: Theoretically, time travel--
translation.zh: ‎理论上讲 时间旅行已经…

translation.en: Oh my God! You're killing me with the theoretical.
translation.zh: ‎老天 你的理论要烦死我了

translation.en: -Yes, that should do it. -Good. Let's do that.
translation.zh:
‎-可以 那样应该能行
‎-那就好 我们去吧

translation.en: -Okay. Okay. -Okay. Okay.
-This is where you work. -Yes.
Only took you 44 years to bring me here.
Fair.
I am so keeping this thing.
-[Adam] So this is it? -[Louis] This is it.
I gotta hand it to you, Dad. You were not messin' around.
translation.zh:
‎我得夸夸你 爸爸
‎你还真不是在胡闹

translation.en: This is where we house the hard drive.
-[Adam] What happens if you pull it out? -[Louis] One of two things.
translation.zh:
‎-如果拔出来会怎样？
‎-可能会是两个结果

translation.en: The accelerator will continue to run on a dormant loop.
translation.zh: ‎加速器会继续按休眠回路运行

translation.en: But without the algorithm, no one will ever be able to program it again.
translation.zh: ‎但没了算法 ‎它就不会再接受编程指令

translation.en: Or?
Or there's a cataclysmic meltdown
that will destroy all living things within 100 miles.
translation.zh: ‎杀死方圆160公里内所有的活物

translation.en: Well, let's hope it's the first thing.
[computer] Neuromorphic hard drive panel accessed.
Screw it.
[Maya] Louis.
[Louis] Maya?
Long time no see.
Oh, this shit's about to get weird.
Were you really gonna steal that from us? Destroy everything we've worked for?
translation.zh:
‎你真的要偷走我们的硬盘吗？
‎毁掉我们所有的心血？

translation.en: [Louis] Our work was supposed to have moral ground rules.
translation.zh: ‎我们的工作应该是有道德准则的

translation.en: -We were gonna change the world. -Change the world?
translation.zh:
‎-我们是要改变世界
‎-改变世界？

translation.en: The only thing that's changed is you. Have you lost your mind?
translation.zh: ‎明显只有你改变了 你疯了吗？

translation.en: All these years, I funded your work.
translation.zh: ‎这么多年来 我一直资助你的研究

translation.en: I'm not the villain here. I spent millions--
translation.zh: ‎我不是坏人 我投资了数百万…

translation.en: Hundreds of millions of my money, my wealth.
translation.zh: ‎我花费了好几亿美元 ‎我的财富 资助你所有的异想天开

translation.en: -Mmm. -Just to fund your every indulgence.
translation.zh: ‎我的财富 资助你所有的异想天开

translation.en: But this…
this is mine to do with as I please.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的财产 我说了算

translation.en: Now,
Adam,
give me… the drive.
No.
Just… no.
I thought you were gonna say that.
Come here.
Gimme the gun.
Maya, Jesus Christ.
What are you doing? Are you crazy?
Oh, I think that's well established.
Adam, just listen to her.
It's okay. It's all right.
'Cause Adam's gonna give me the drive right now.
translation.zh: ‎因为亚当会马上把硬盘给我

translation.en: Aren't you, Adam?
-Adam? -Adam?
[Sorian] Hey, beautiful idiot. If I shoot him, you die too.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 帅气的白痴 ‎如果我朝他开枪 你也会没命

translation.en: [Louis] Adam?
I'm thinking it over.
-What? What do you mean you're thinking? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？你说在考虑是什么意思？
‎-对 情况有点复杂

translation.en: -It's a complicated issue. -What is there to think over?
translation.zh:
‎-什么？你说在考虑是什么意思？
‎-对 情况有点复杂 ‎-有什么可考虑的？
‎-这是个重大的决定！

translation.en: -It's a big decision! -No, it's not!
translation.zh:
‎-有什么可考虑的？
‎-这是个重大的决定！

translation.en: -It's not. -I need to think it through!
translation.zh:
‎-才不是
‎-我需要好好考虑一下！

translation.en: I'm about to lose my shit here!
-Give her the drive! -Give her the drive, man!
-Give her the drive! -[Maya] Please!
[computer] Electromagnetic seal compromised.
[computer] Commencing emergency protocols.
[soldier] Come here.
-Dad! -Adam!
[young Adam] Ow!
[grunts] Hey! Let me go! [Louis] Adam, just hang on!
-[young Adam] Let me go! -Get me that drive! Now!
[computer] Access denied.
[young Adam] Get off me! Dad!
This way!
♪ I don't want no more ♪
Yeah.
-Get the drive! -The drive!
[whispers] Superhero landing.
Ever had your ass kicked by a 12-year-old nerd with an inhaler?
translation.zh:
‎你有没有被一个离不开吸入器的
‎12岁呆子揍过？

translation.en: -Suppertime, Spanky. -No.
-[yelps] -No!
Finish him!
-[Christos] Come on! -[choking]
-[Sorian] Christos! -No!
[computer] Core breached.
Reactor stability compromised.
Commence evacuation.
Lockdown in two minutes.
Buddy, it's time to go. Come on.
I can't shut it down!
[Maya] Stop!
I want my drive.
You can't have it.
Shoot him now.
Get behind me, both of you.
Look, Dad, Dad, those guns shoot armor-piercing bullets.
translation.zh:
‎听着 爸爸 这种枪发射的子弹
‎能击穿盔甲

translation.en: So even behind you, we're still Swiss cheese.
translation.zh:
‎所以就算躲在你后面
‎我们还是会被打成筛子

translation.en: -Thanks for that information. -You're welcome.
-Maybe spread out a little. -Maybe a good idea.
translation.zh:
‎-或许我们应该散开一点
‎-这或许是个好主意

translation.en: [Louis] Maya, you're not a murderer.
Not yet, anyway.
[Sorian] Listen to me.
Everything we've worked for,
it goes away unless you pull this trigger.
translation.zh: ‎都会付诸东流 除非你扣动扳机

translation.en: Okay, come on.
[computer] One minute 30 seconds until lockdown.
[Sorian] You can do it.
Do it!
Maya, you're better than this.
translation.zh: ‎玛雅 你不至于这么卑鄙

translation.en: Sorry, Louis, but you brought this on yourself.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 路易斯 但这是你自找的

translation.en: Maybe so.
You think I'm playing?
Ask your son how I play.
I had to kill his wife twice to protect the integrity of my program.
translation.zh:
‎为了保证项目不受干扰
‎我不得不杀了他妻子两次

translation.en: Now, don't think I won't put a bullet right through you.
Give it to me!
No.
[computer] One minute until lockdown.
You just never understood the bigger picture. [chuckles sadly]
And you never understood the science.
How did you know that would work?
Those armor-piercing rounds contain a magnetic steel core.
translation.zh: ‎那些能击穿盔甲的子弹里有磁钢核心

translation.en: Sometimes it pays to be a nerd, guys.
translation.zh: ‎两位 有时候当呆子也有好处

translation.en: [computer] Containment protocol initiated.
-Ten seconds remaining. -Whoa.
-Yeah, we should run. -Yep.
